text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/attribution-code-system
  • Include all codes defined in http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/attribution-source
  • Include all codes defined in http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/attribution-product

name: AttributionCodeValueSet
title: Attribution Codes
description: Types of attribution used to associate a patient to a provider
